title: Please dont...not this Client
body: Riot this new client is so clunky and the old one was smooth and things were laid out nice. Now the text is hard to read in places and everything is disjointed and out of place, you made it a lot more confusing now to navigate and things are missing now! Aram and norms wins count are gone and so are other things. Mostly my issue is the chat being difficult to navigate and see who msged u last.

replies.body: im stuck in the updating, been here for about 10hrs, CANT PLAY ON LEGACY, THE ONLY OPTION IS TO FINISH THE UPDATE WITCH DOES NOT FINISH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! ive managed to get about 900mb downloaded then get an error and have to start ALL over again, ty riot another quality product.
It's confusing and clunky because it's new and you've not used it. I've been using it for about a week, you get used to it and it looks pretty nice.
